prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a lily pad and swims in fresh water.
Show me a cute aquatic creature with a bright green top and blue body.
Imagine a Pokemon that is a mix of plant and water, with a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon design based on a small, floating plant that thrives in wetlands.
Make a whimsical creature that has a leaf on its head and enjoys sunbathing.
Design a Pokemon with a round shape that loves to play in the rain.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that combines features of a water lily and a tadpole.
